body_html:
This isn't really a bug -- some library or user code is trying to place "sharded_filename" on GPU, and sharded_filename can't be placed on GPU.

The solutions are to enable soft_placement in the ConfigProto (dangerous), or figure out why the user/library code is trying to assign a string-based operation to a GPU.

body:
This isn't really a bug -- some library or user code is trying to place "sharded_filename" on GPU, and sharded_filename can't be placed on GPU.

The solutions are to enable soft_placement in the ConfigProto (dangerous), or figure out why the user/library code is trying to assign a string-based operation to a GPU.
